name: neovim-strudel-server
description: Refactored Neovim + Strudel integration server with modular TypeScript architecture

scripts.build: bun build --target=bun --outdir=dist --sourcemap=external server.ts client-app.ts client-api.ts client-ui.ts client-types.ts server-file-manager.ts server-neovim-manager.ts server-playwright-manager.ts
scripts.build:client: bun build --target=browser --outdir=dist/client client-app.ts client-api.ts client-ui.ts client-types.ts
scripts.build:server: bun build --target=bun --outdir=dist/server server.ts server-file-manager.ts server-neovim-manager.ts server-playwright-manager.ts

author: Strudel Integration Team
